name.en: Income Tax Increase - Net Income Reduction
name.hi: आयकर वृद्धि - शुद्ध आय में कमी

embedding_text: Understand how an increase in income tax leads to a reduction in net income and calculate the rate of income tax using percentage tricks.

trick.hinglish: Jab income tax 22% se badhta hai aur net income 3% se ghat jaati hai, toh income aur tax ka ratio nikalne ke liye 22/3 ka use karo. Fir tax rate ko 3/25 se calculate karo.

steps.explanation: Yeh step batata hai ki income ka 3% tax ke 22% ke barabar hai.
Is ratio ko use karke income aur tax ka sambandh samjho.
Is calculation se aapko tax rate mil jaata hai.

common_mistakes: Income aur tax ke percentage ko ulta samajhna.
Directly 22% aur 3% ko subtract karke answer nikalna.

teaching_content.deep: Aapko samajhna hoga ki jab income tax 22% se badhta hai, toh net income 3% se ghat jaati hai. Iska matlab hai ki income ka 3% tax ke 22% ke barabar hai. Isse aapko income aur tax ka ratio 22/3 milta hai. Is ratio ko simplify karke aap tax rate 3/25 yaani 12% nikal sakte hain.
teaching_content.shortcut: 22/3 ka ratio use karo aur tax rate ko 3/25 se calculate karo. Answer hai 12%.
